attributes.action: Clinical trials into using IVERMECTIN as a prevention and treatment of Covid 19.
attributes.additional_details:
The currently available results from the independent and worldwide Ivermectin trials need to be made widely known to the public, through the BBC's Coronavirus Update TV program.

attributes.background:
Urgent request for government backed clinical trials.
 To follow the science provided by many worldwide professionals, in particular the FLCCC formed by leading Critical Care specialists, that have extremely positive results in the efficacy of Ivermectin against Covid 19.
